summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2835, for the improvement of West Stevens Street, from California Avenue to 45th Avenue Southwest, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, constructing concrete sidewalks, together with all necessary cross walks and providing for the necessary surface drainage; under Ordinance No. 34112 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
